it.jrc.lt.core.component

Class Configuration

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.jrc.lt.core.component.Configuration

  • public class Configuration
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements a configuration used by components in order to initialize a component object
    Author:
    Jakub Piskorski

      • initializeFrom

        public static Configuration initializeFrom(java.lang.String fileName)
        Initializes the configuration via reading a property file
        Parameters:
        fileName - path to the property file to read from
        Returns:
        a handle to dynamically created configuration or an instance of 'NullConfiguration'

      • initializeFrom

        public static Configuration initializeFrom(java.util.Properties properties)
        Initializes the configuration via passing properties argument
        Parameters:
        properties - Properties object
        Returns:
        a handle to dynamically created configuration or an instance of 'NullConfiguration' if properties are null

      • getFeature

        public java.lang.String getFeature(java.lang.String featureName)
        Returns the feature value for a given feature name
        Parameters:
        featureName - name of the feature
        Returns:
        the value of the feature named "featureName".

      • getFeature

        public java.lang.String getFeature(java.lang.String featureName,
                                   java.lang.String tempDefault)
        Returns the feature value for a given feature name
        Parameters:
        featureName - name of the feature
        tempDefault - default value which will be returned if the the feature is not specified
        Returns:
        the value of the feature named with "featureName" or "tempDefault" in case the feature is unspecified.

      • addFeature

        public void addFeature(java.lang.String featureName,
                       java.lang.String featureValue)
        Adds a new feature to the configuration
        Parameters:
        featureName - name of the feature
        featureValue - value of the feature

      • checkConfiguration

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> checkConfiguration(java.util.List<ConfigurationFeature> specificFeatures)
        This method checks the configuration whether it is complianat with the given list of specific configuration features. In case of a missing feature in the current configuration, each will be set to the default value specified in in the list of specific features.
        Parameters:
        specificFeatures - a list of specific Configuration Features
        Returns:
        an array list of errors if any, or an empty array list in case of valid configurations

      • isNull

        public boolean isNull()
        Checks whether the configuration is a 'Null' configuration
        Returns:
        true if the configuration is a 'null' configuration, or false otherwise

      • print

        public java.lang.String print()
        Returns the configuration as string.
        Returns:
        a string representing the configuration
